resources.title: Project Manager
resources.comments: This extension is great for keeping track of several projects folders of your various projects.  In class this might be helpful to switch between the class repo and your HW projects. Def check this one out.  I live by it!

resources.title: Turbo Console Log
resources.comments: I like this one because it helps me create console logs quickly by simply highlighting the thing I need to log, hit a keyboard shortcut and bam you have your log ready for you.  I do wish it would let me use single quotes instead of double quotes
